channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2023080256
item.description:
Report X-2023080256

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-22T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-24
  • City: HAMPTON
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was being unloaded when the leak was discovered. Package was placed under the hood. DescribePack: Loose caps caused liquid to spill onto the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed under the vented hood system.

item.title: Report X-2023080031
item.description:
Report X-2023080031

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-22
  • City: RICHMOND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO EAST BOXLINE. THE LOADER SHOWED RESPONDER THE PACKAGE AND RESPONDER USED DECISION TREE RESPONSE TO CLEAN AREA AND MOVE PACKAGE TO DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
